show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

header.title: The Irreparable Damage Inflicted By the Federal Reserve

title: The Irreparable Damage Inflicted By the Federal Reserve
content:
I describe the absurd efforts by the Fed to repair an economy which was always outside its control. <!--more--> They have no clue, largely because there is no clue to be had… rather like asking a lathe operator to fly a plane.
The Fed does not and never did have the weapons to treat this particular disease.
A $17 trillion economy is much too complicated to be brought to heel by twelve humans gathering in a room once every few weeks.
But, of course, it’s not only that they did not succeed, they did immense damage in the process.
Stock market comment.
Washington’s problem in having to “roll over” $8 trillion in debt a year.
Problems with the current dollar rally.
The Centre for Economic Policy Research in Geneva debunk the concept of ‘deleveraging’, confirming that there has been virtually none.
Some of the scandals arising from zero interest rates.
The U.
S government invents terrorist groups and activity to render the population helpless and dependent.
I present virtual proof of this.
Bernanke was turned down for a refinancing!
